metadata.synopsis: Astarion and Gale discuss the Moonrise Bridge.

1.speaker: Astarion
1.text: Moonlanterns to keep the curse back, burly guards to fight off any monsters - I could get used to this place.

0.speaker: Gale
0.text: Don't get too comfortable. We shouldn't overstay our welcome in such a place.
0.context: NodeContext: Serious, bringing Astarion back down to earth

2.speaker: Astarion
2.text: No, of course. Why stay somewhere safe and comfortable when we could be in mortal peril?
